channel.title: Dennis Kieselhorst on Community Over Code Europe
channel.description: Recent content in Dennis Kieselhorst on Community Over Code Europe

item.title: Modernize APIs to run serverless using Apache CXF
item.description: Years ago the Service-oriented architecture (SOA) architectural style came along with implementations of web services based on standards like the Web Service Description Language (WSDL) and SOAP. Many of these interfaces are still in place as of today as a change requires both provider and all consumers to agree on a new definition and change the implementation (often without any business value). The underlying infrastructure, sometimes based on Enterprise Services Buses (ESB) is however often end-of-life and hard to maintain.
